about_the_game:
Super Dungeon Boy 2 is more challenging! A new version so special it will set your hands on fire and freeze your brain.
Explore the volcanic and icy caves with different mechanics and strategies that you will have to develop in a scenario with several paths!
In addition to enemies and bosses, the scenery will also hinder you in several ways. All this while you try to find out why our Boy is on this adventure.
Have fun with the “inhabitants” and their easter eggs. Delight in the hidden treasures and surprises that await you.

What you will find:

  • It's simple to learn and play!
  • Keyboard, mouse and controls compatibility.
  • 3 difficulty modes: Easy, Normal and ULTRA RAPID FIRE!
  • Angry bosses. They won't go easy on you.
  • Several challenging levels. Each with their own achievements.
  • Insane achievements with lots of humor... BELIEVE IT!
  • Countless secret areas... WE DOUBT YOU'LL FIND ALL OF THEM!!!

I AM THE BEST! - Show everyone who is the master of pyrophagy!


How about heating things up a bit? PLAY NOW!
detailed_description:
Super Dungeon Boy 2 is more challenging! A new version so special it will set your hands on fire and freeze your brain.
Explore the volcanic and icy caves with different mechanics and strategies that you will have to develop in a scenario with several paths!
In addition to enemies and bosses, the scenery will also hinder you in several ways. All this while you try to find out why our Boy is on this adventure.
Have fun with the “inhabitants” and their easter eggs. Delight in the hidden treasures and surprises that await you.

What you will find:

  • It's simple to learn and play!
  • Keyboard, mouse and controls compatibility.
  • 3 difficulty modes: Easy, Normal and ULTRA RAPID FIRE!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Intel Core™ Duo or faster
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: optional
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires updated drivers for better performance
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Intel Core™ Duo or faster
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 6100, Intel X3000 or Radeon X1300
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires updated drivers for better performance

name: Super Dungeon Boy 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP SP2+
  • Processor: Intel Core™ Duo or faster
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: optional
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 10, 8, 7, Vista
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or faster
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 6100, Intel X3000 or Radeon X1300
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

short_description: Based on hit retro games, here you'll find action, platforming adventure and exploration. I challenge you to find all the secret dungeons!
